CofD.SceneNotes.noItems: No items in this scene. Drag an item onto this window to add it!
CofD.SceneNotes.deleteSceneDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this scene? You will not be able to recover the scene itself, but all actors, journals and items in the world will remain in the world.
